sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* 토지계약자 납부정보 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO , a.PAY_CODE /* 납부코드 */ , c.CODE_NM AS PAY_CODE_NM /* 납부코드명 */ , '[' || a.PAY_CODE || '] '|| c.CODE_NM AS PAY_CODE_NM_ALL /* 납부코드명 */ , a.PAY_TMLMT /* 납부기한일 */
, (NVL(a.PAYAMT, 0) + NVL(a.INSTLMT_INTR, 0) ) AS PAYAMT /* 납부금액 */
/* 손연옥 수정 */ , CASE WHEN a.PAY_CODE = 'SE' AND a.PAYAMT < 0 THEN 0 ELSE decode(a.rciv_de,null, 0, (NVL(a.PAYAMT, 0) + NVL(a.INSTLMT_INTR, 0) + NVL(a.ARRRG_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.PREPAY_DSCNT_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.RDCAMT_AMOUNT, 0) )) end as RCIV_AMOUNT /* 납부금액 */ , a.ARRRG_AMOUNT /* 연체금액 */ , a.PREPAY_DSCNT_AMOUNT /* 선납할인 */ , (NVL(a.ARRRG_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.PREPAY_DSCNT_AMOUNT, 0)) AS ARRRG_PREPAY_DSCNT_AMOUNT /* 연체_선납할인 */ , a.INSTLMT_INTR /* 할부이자 */
, (NVL(a.PAYAMT, 0) + NVL(a.INSTLMT_INTR, 0) + NVL(a.ARRRG_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.PREPAY_DSCNT_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.RDCAMT_AMOUNT, 0) ) AS PAYAMT_SUM /* 납부합계 */
, DECODE (a.rciv_de, NULL , '' ,b.RCIV_DE) AS RCIV_DE /* 수납일자 */
, CASE WHEN a.PAY_CODE = 'SE' AND a.PAYAMT < 0 THEN 0 ELSE (NVL(a.PAYAMT, 0) + NVL(a.INSTLMT_INTR, 0) + NVL(a.ARRRG_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.PREPAY_DSCNT_AMOUNT, 0) + NVL(a.RDCAMT_AMOUNT, 0) ) - NVL( b.RCIV_AMOUNT, 0) END AS NPYAMT_SUM /* 미납합계 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY a /* 토지계약자 납부 */ , TBSLS_LAD_RCIV_PSTMRK b /* 토지수납 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD0A1' /* 토지납부코드 */ ) c WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = b.CNTRCTR_NO(+) AND a.PAY_NO = b.PAY_NO(+) AND a.PAY_CODE = c.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# /* 토지계약자번호 */
AND a.LTTOT_RENT_SE = #LTTOT_RENT_SE# /* 분양임화성분 */
ORDER BY a.PAY_CODE , a.PAY_TMLMT

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportA01 A1 부동산거래계약신고서 조회 */ a1.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , a1.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , a1.IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호(마스크) */ , a1.CSTMR_ADRES_ALL /* 고객주소 */ , a1.OWN_QOTA /* 고객지분(거래지분) */ , a1.TELNO /* 전화번호 */ , ('(이동전화 : ' || a1.MBTLNO || ')') AS MBTLNO /* 휴대폰번호 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a1.CNTRCT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY') AS CNTRCT_DE_Y /* 계약일자_년 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a1.CNTRCT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM') AS CNTRCT_DE_M /* 계약일자_월 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a1.CNTRCT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD') AS CNTRCT_DE_D /* 계약일자_일 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b1.JAN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY') AS JAN_DE_Y /* 잔금지급(예정)일_년 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b1.JAN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM') AS JAN_DE_M /* 잔금지급(예정)일_월 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b1.JAN_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD') AS JAN_DE_D /* 잔금지급(예정)일_일 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b1.PAYEND_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY') AS PAYEND_DE_Y /* 중도지급일_년 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b1.PAYEND_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'MM') AS PAYEND_DE_M /* 중도지급일_월 */ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(b1.PAYEND_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'DD') AS PAYEND_DE_D /* 중도지급일_일 */ , a1.LOCPLC_ADRES /* 토지소재지 */ , a1.LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 토지소재지(지번) */ , a1.PRPOS_SE_NM /* 용도구분(지목) */ , a1.DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , CASE a1.LAD_COCNR_CNT WHEN 0 THEN '100 분의 100' ELSE ('100 분의 ' || TO_CHAR(a1.LAD_COCNR_CNT)) END AS COCNR_CNT /* */ , a1.PERSON_CONT_AREA /* 면적 */ , b1.SUM_TOT_PAYAMT /* 납부금액(총금액) */ , b1.SUM_PAYAMT /* 계약금 */ , b1.SUM_JAN_AMT /* 잔금 */ , b1.SUM_PAYEND_AMT /* 중도금 */ , a1.BUY_RATIO /* 대지권비율 */ /* 매도인정보 */ , c1.MTLTY /* 상호 */ , c1.RPRSNTV /* 대표자 */ , c1.JURIRNO /* 법인등록번호 */ , c1.CPR_ADRES_ALL /* 주소 */ , c1.CPR_TELNO /* 전화번호 */ FROM (SELECT a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , DECODE(a.CNTRCTR_MTLTY, NULL, c.CSTMR_NM, (a.CNTRCTR_MTLTY || ' (' || c.CSTMR_NM || ')')) AS CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , c.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(c.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호 */ , LTRIM(c.ADRES || ' ' || c.ADRES_DETAIL) AS CSTMR_ADRES_ALL /* 고객주소 */ , DECODE(c.TELNO, NULL, ' ', c.TELNO) AS TELNO /* 전화번호 */ , DECODE(c.MBTLNO, NULL, ' ', c.MBTLNO) AS MBTLNO /* 휴대폰번호 */ , a.CNTRCT_DE /* 계약일자 */ /* 토지정보 */ , LTRIM(b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES) AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 토지소재지 */ , LTRIM(b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM) AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 토지소재지(지번) */ , DECODE(b.LAD_CODE, '022', '잡종지', NVL(e.CHRCTR_PREPAR_VALUE_0, e.CODE_NM)) AS PRPOS_SE_NM /* 이용구분(지목) */ , b.DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , CASE WHEN NVL (d.COCNR_CNT, 0) = 0 THEN '100 분의 100' ELSE (SELECT QOTA FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR WHERE CNTRCTR_NO = a.CNTRCTR_NO AND LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR = a.LAD_CSTMR_NO) END AS OWN_QOTA /* 소유지분 */ , DECODE (NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0), 0, b.BGNN_AR, b.DCSN_AR) AS PERSON_CONT_AREA /* 면적 */ , NVL(d.COCNR_CNT, 0) AS LAD_COCNR_CNT /* 계약자수 */ , DECODE(b.ALL_AR, NVL(b.DCSN_AR, b.BGNN_AR), '100 분의 100', b.ALL_AR || ' 분의 ' || NVL (b.DCSN_AR, b.BGNN_AR)) AS BUY_RATIO /* 대지권 비율 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 lnt_ct_info */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 lnt_ln_infomst */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR c /* 토지고객 */ , (SELECT CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , COUNT(1) AS COCNR_CNT /* 공유자수 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR /* 토지계약자공유자 lnt_ct_cowoner */ WHERE CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# GROUP BY CNTRCTR_NO ) d , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM , CHRCTR_PREPAR_VALUE_0 FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' /* 토지용도코드 */ AND USE_AT = '1' ) e WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = d.CNTRCTR_NO(+) AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = c.LAD_CSTMR_NO AND b.PRPOS_SE = e.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# ) a1 , (SELECT SUM(x.PAYAMT) AS SUM_TOT_PAYAMT /* 납부금액(총금액) */ , SUM(DECODE(x.PAY_CODE, 'S0', x.PAYAMT, 0)) AS SUM_PAYAMT /* 계약금 */ , SUM(DECODE(x.PAY_CODE, 'S0', 0, 'S9', 0, 'SE', 0, x.PAYAMT)) AS SUM_PAYEND_AMT /* 중도금 */ , SUM(DECODE(x.PAY_CODE, 'S9', x.PAYAMT, 0)) AS SUM_JAN_AMT /* 잔금 */ , MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(x.PAY_CODE, 2, 1) BETWEEN '1' AND '8' THEN x.PAY_TMLMT END) AS PAYEND_DE /* 중도지급일 */ , MAX(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(x.PAY_CODE, 2, 1) = '9' THEN x.PAY_TMLMT END) AS JAN_DE /* 잔금지급(예정)일 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY x /* 토지계약자납부 lnt_ct_vote */ WHERE x.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# /* 계약자번호 */ AND x.PAY_CODE LIKE 'S%' /* 분양 납부코드 */ ) b1 , (SELECT y.BIZRNO /* 사업자등록번호 */ , y.MTLTY /* 상호 */ , y.JURIRNO /* 법인등록번호 */ , y.RPRSNTV /* 대표자 */ , LTRIM(y.ADRES || ' ' || y.ADRES_DETAIL) AS CPR_ADRES_ALL /* 주소 */ , y.ADRES_RN AS CPR_ADRES_RN /* 주소_도로명 */ , NVL(y.TELNO, '0533500343') AS CPR_TELNO /* 전화번호 */ FROM TBPMS_CPR_INFO y /* 법인정보 */ WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY y.UPDT_DT DESC ) c1 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportA1Sub 부동산거래계약신고서 별지(공유자 목록) 조회 */ b.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , b.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(b.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호 마스크 */ , TRIM(b.ADRES || ' ' || b.ADRES_DETAIL) AS ADRES_ALL /* 전체 주소 */ , a.QOTA /* 지분 */ , NVL(b.MBTLNO, b.TELNO) AS MBTLNO /* 이동전화 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR a /* 토지계약자공유자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR b /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.RELIS_DE IS NULL /* 해제일자 */ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR /* 토지계약자 */ WHERE CNTRCTR_NO = a.CNTRCTR_NO AND LAD_CSTMR_NO = a.LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR) AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR = b.LAD_CSTMR_NO AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# ORDER BY b.CSTMR_NM

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC01Info 분양확인서 내용조회 */ /* 토지의 표시 */ d.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || d.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES_ALL /* 소재지 주소 */ , d.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || d.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM_ALL /* 소재지 주소_지번 */ , c.LAD_NM /* 토지명 */ , DECODE(d.REAL_BLCK, NULL, (d.BLCK || '-' || d.LOT || '-' || d.LOT_TY), (d.REAL_BLCK || '-' || d.REAL_LOT || '-' || d.REAL_LOT_TY)) AS LAD_BLT /* 토지 B.L.T */ , DECODE(NVL(d.DCSN_AR, 0), 0, d.BGNN_AR, d.DCSN_AR) AS DCSN_AR /* 분양면적(확정면적) */ , e.PAYAMT /* 분양금액(납부금액) */ , f.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_CODE_NM /* 용도코드명 */ , g.CODE_NM AS SUPLY_CODE_NM /* 공급구분코드명 */ /* 분양계약자 */ , b.ADRES || ' ' || b.ADRES_DETAIL AS CSTMR_ADRES_ALL /* 토지계약자 주소 */ , b.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , b.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(b.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호_마스크 */ , b.TELNO /* 전화번호 */ , b.MBTLNO /* 휴대폰번호 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 LNT_CT_INFO */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR b /* 토지고객 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO c /* 토지정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO d /* 토지상세정보 xhwlLNT_LN_INFOMST */ , (SELECT x.CNTRCTR_NO , SUM(x.PAYAMT) AS PAYAMT FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY x /* 토지계약자 납부 LNT_CT_VOTE */ WHERE x.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# AND x.PAY_CODE NOT IN ('HG', 'HC') AND x.PAY_CODE LIKE 'S%' GROUP BY x.CNTRCTR_NO ) e , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' ) f , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD004' ) g WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = b.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND a.LAD_CODE = d.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = d.BLCK AND a.LOT = d.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = d.LOT_TY AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = e.CNTRCTR_NO AND d.PRPOS_SE = f.CODE(+) AND d.SUPLY_CODE = g.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC02Info C02 사실확인서 내용 조회 */ '화성도시공사에서 조성하여 공급한' || a1.LOCPLC_ADRES_ALL || ' "' || a1.LAD_NM || '" 내 \n임시로 부여한 지번(블럭-롯트) 및 면적이 다음과 같이 변경 확정되었음을 확인함.' AS INTRO , a1.LOCPLC_ADRES_ALL || ' ' || DECODE(a1.REAL_BLCK, NULL, (a1.BLCK || '블럭 ' || a1.LOT || '로트'), (a1.REAL_BLCK || '블럭 ' || a1.REAL_LOT || '로트')) AS LN_BEF_ADDR , a1.LOCPLC_ADRES_ALL AS LN_AFT_ADDR , a1.BGNN_AR , a1.DCSN_AR , '본인(회사)는 화성도시공사에서 조성하여 공급한 ' || a1.LOCPLC_ADRES_ALL || ' 소재 ' || a1.PRPOS_SE_NM || ' 잔금납부, 정산 및 소유권 이전등기 신청과 관련하여 화성도시공사에서 교부한 다음의 서류를 틀림없이 수령하였기에 이 확인서에 서명날인 후 제출합니다.' AS INTRO1 FROM (SELECT b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES_ALL , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM_ALL , c.LAD_NM , b.BLCK , b.LOT , b.REAL_BLCK , b.REAL_LOT , b.BGNN_AR , b.DCSN_AR , d.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_SE_NM FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO c /* 토지정보 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' /* 용도코드 */ ) d WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND b.PRPOS_SE = d.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# ) a1 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC03Info C03 위임장(소유권이전) 부동산 및 등기의무자 정보 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 토지계약자번호 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 토지주소 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 토지주소_지번 */ , NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0) AS DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , d.RCIV_DE /* 등기일자(계약금 수납일자) */ , c.CSTMR_NM /* 토지고객명 */ , c.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(c.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호_마스크 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN f.CPR_ADRES_ALL ELSE '화성광역시장' END AS CPR_ADRES /* 주소 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN f.CPR_ADRES_RN ELSE '화성광역시장' END AS CPR_ADRES_RN /* 주소_도로명 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN f.MTLTY ELSE '' END AS MTLTY /* 상호 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN f.RPRSNTV ELSE '' END AS RPRSNTV /* 대표자 */ , NVL(e.COCNR_CNT, 0) + 1 AS COCNR_CNT , DECODE(a.SUPLY_SE, '07', '대토보상', '매매') AS SUPLY_SE_NM FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR c /* 토지고객 */ , (SELECT x.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , x.RCIV_DE /* 수납일자 */ FROM TBSLS_LAD_RCIV_PSTMRK x /* 토지수납 */ WHERE x.PAY_CODE = 'S0' /* 납부코드(계약금) */ ) d , (SELECT y.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , COUNT(1) AS COCNR_CNT /* 공유자수 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR y /* 토지계약자공유자 lnt_ct_cowoner */ WHERE y.RELIS_DE IS NULL /* 해제일자 */ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR /* 토지계약자 */ WHERE CNTRCTR_NO = y.CNTRCTR_NO AND LAD_CSTMR_NO = y.LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR) GROUP BY CNTRCTR_NO ) e , (SELECT y.BIZRNO /* 사업자등록번호 */ , y.MTLTY /* 상호 */ , y.JURIRNO /* 법인등록번호 */ , y.RPRSNTV /* 대표자 */ , LTRIM(y.ADRES || ' ' || y.ADRES_DETAIL) AS CPR_ADRES_ALL /* 주소 */ , y.ADRES_RN AS CPR_ADRES_RN /* 주소_도로명 */ , NVL(y.TELNO, '0533500343') AS CPR_TELNO /* 전화번호 */ FROM TBPMS_CPR_INFO y /* 법인정보 */ WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY y.UPDT_DT DESC ) f WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.CANCL_DE IS NULL /* 해약일자 */ AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = c.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = d.CNTRCTR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = e.CNTRCTR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC03AddInfo 등기권리자정보 조회 2건 까지 조회 2건 이상시 별지 처리 */ NVL(MAX(CSTMR_NM1),'* 별지내역과 같음') AS CSTMR_NM1 , MAX(CSTMR_ADRES1) AS CSTMR_ADRES1 , MAX(CSTMR_NM2) AS CSTMR_NM2 , MAX(CSTMR_ADRES2) AS CSTMR_ADRES2 FROM (SELECT DECODE(NUM, 1, CSTMR_NM) AS CSTMR_NM1 , DECODE(NUM, 1, CSTMR_ADRES) AS CSTMR_ADRES1 , DECODE(NUM, 2, CSTMR_NM) AS CSTMR_NM2 , DECODE(NUM, 2, CSTMR_ADRES) AS CSTMR_ADRES2 FROM (SELECT 1 AS NUM , LTRIM(b.CSTMR_NM || '(지분 100)') AS CSTMR_NM , LTRIM(b.ADRES || ' ' || ADRES_DETAIL) AS CSTMR_ADRES FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR b /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = b.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = DECODE(#COCNR_CNT#, 1, #CNTRCTR_NO#, '1') UNION SELECT ROWNUM AS NUNM , LTRIM(d.CSTMR_NM || '(지분 ' || c.QOTA || ')' ) AS CSTMR_NM , LTRIM(d.ADRES || ' ' || d.ADRES_DETAIL ) AS CSTMR_ADRES FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR c /* 토지계약자공유자 lnt_ct_cowoner */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR d /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR = d.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND c.RELIS_DE IS NULL /* 해제일자 */
AND c.CNTRCTR_NO = (CASE WHEN #COCNR_CNT# <= 2
THEN #CNTRCTR_NO# ELSE '1' END) ) )

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC04Info 환매특약말소등기신청 내용 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 토지계약자번호 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 토지주소 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 토지주소_지번 */ , NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0) AS DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , a.CANCL_DE /* 해약일자 */ , c.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , c.ADRES || ' ' || c.ADRES_DETAIL AS ADRES /* 고객주소 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 lnt_ct_info */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 lnt_ln_infomst */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR c /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = c.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC05Info C05 위임장_환매권말소 내용 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 토지계약자번호 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 토지주소 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 토지주소_지번 */ , NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0) AS DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , a.CANCL_DE /* 해약일자 */ , c.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , c.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(c.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호_마스크 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN d.CPR_ADRES_ALL ELSE '화성광역시장' END AS CPR_ADRES /* 주소 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN d.CPR_ADRES_RN ELSE '화성광역시장' END AS CPR_ADRES_RN /* 주소_도로명 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN d.MTLTY ELSE '' END AS MTLTY /* 상호 */ , CASE #ISSU_OFC# WHEN '01' THEN d.RPRSNTV ELSE '' END AS RPRSNTV /* 대표자 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR c /* 토지고객 */ , (SELECT y.BIZRNO /* 사업자등록번호 */ , y.MTLTY /* 상호 */ , y.JURIRNO /* 법인등록번호 */ , y.RPRSNTV /* 대표자 */ , LTRIM(y.ADRES || ' ' || y.ADRES_DETAIL) AS CPR_ADRES_ALL /* 주소 */ , y.ADRES_RN AS CPR_ADRES_RN /* 주소_도로명 */ , NVL(y.TELNO, '0533500343') AS CPR_TELNO /* 전화번호 */ FROM TBPMS_CPR_INFO y /* 법인정보 */ WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY y.UPDT_DT DESC ) d WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = c.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC06Info C06 해지증서_환매특약 내용 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 토지계약자번호 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 토지주소 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 토지주소_지번 */ , NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0) AS DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , c.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , c.ADRES || ' ' || c.ADRES_DETAIL AS ADRES /* 주소_고객 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR c /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = c.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC07Info C07 추천서 내용 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , d.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , d.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(d.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호_마스크 */ , d.ADRES || ' ' || d.ADRES_DETAIL AS ADRES /* 주소_고객 */ , c.LAD_NM /* 토지명 */ , DECODE(NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0), 0, b.BGNN_AR, b.DCSN_AR) AS DCSN_AR , DECODE(b.REAL_BLCK, NULL, (a.BLCK || 'B ' || a.LOT || 'L' ), ( b.REAL_BLCK || 'B ' || b.REAL_LOT || 'L' )) AS LAD_BLT , DECODE (a.BLCK, NULL, '', ('('||a.BLCK || '-' || a.LOT || ')')) AS CLAD_BLT , f.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_SE_NM /* 용도구분 */ , DECODE(NVL(e.PAYAMT, 0), 0, DECODE(NVL(b.DCSN_AMOUNT, 0), 0, b.BGNN_AMOUNT, b.DCSN_AMOUNT), e.PAYAMT) AS PAYAMT , a.CNTRCT_DE FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO c /* 토지정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR d /* 토지고객 */ , (SELECT x.CNTRCTR_NO , SUM(x.PAYAMT) AS PAYAMT FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY x /* 토지계약자 납부 */ WHERE x.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# GROUP BY x.CNTRCTR_NO ) e , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' ) f WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = d.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = e.PAYAMT(+) AND b.PRPOS_SE = f.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC07AddInfo C07 추천서 입금(가상)계좌 정보 조회(6개) */ a1.CNTRCTR_NO , MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 1, DECODE(a1.BANK_NM, '', '', a1.BANK_NM||' - '))) || MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 1, a1.VACCT_NO)) AS BANK1 , MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 2, DECODE(a1.BANK_NM, '', '', a1.BANK_NM||' - '))) || MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 2, a1.VACCT_NO)) AS BANK2 , MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 3, DECODE(a1.BANK_NM, '', '', a1.BANK_NM||' - '))) || MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 3, a1.VACCT_NO)) AS BANK3 , MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 4, DECODE(a1.BANK_NM, '', '', a1.BANK_NM||' - '))) || MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 4, a1.VACCT_NO)) AS BANK4 , MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 5, DECODE(a1.BANK_NM, '', '', a1.BANK_NM||' - '))) || MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 5, a1.VACCT_NO)) AS BANK5 , MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 6, DECODE(a1.BANK_NM, '', '', a1.BANK_NM||' - '))) || MAX(DECODE(ROWNUM, 6, a1.VACCT_NO)) AS BANK6 FROM (SELECT a.CUST_CD AS CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , a.BANK_CD /* 은행코드 */ , a.VACCT_NO /* 가상계좌번호 */ , b.CODE_NM AS BANK_NM /* 은행명 */ FROM VA_MAST a /* 가상계좌 계좌원장 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE x /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'COM021' /* 은행코드 */ ) b WHERE a.BANK_CD = b.CODE(+) AND a.CUST_CD = #CNTRCTR_NO# ORDER BY a.BANK_CD ) a1 GROUP BY a1.CNTRCTR_NO

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC07SubList C07 추천서 납부시기정보 */ d.CODE_NM AS PAY_CODE_NM /* 남부코드명 */ , b.PAYAMT /* 납부금액 */ , DECODE(b.PAY_TMLMT, NULL, '사업준공시 별도통보', b.PAY_TMLMT) AS PAY_TMLMT /* 납부기한일 */
, DECODE (b.rciv_de, NULL, '', '수납') AS REP_STAT /* 납부상태 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY b /* 토지계약자납부 */ , TBSLS_LAD_RCIV_PSTMRK c /* 토지수납 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD0A1' /* 토지납부코드 */ ) d WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = b.CNTRCTR_NO AND b.CNTRCTR_NO = c.CNTRCTR_NO(+) AND b.PAY_NO = c.PAY_NO(+) AND b.PAY_CODE = d.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# ORDER BY b.PAY_CODE , b.PAY_TMLMT

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC08Info C08 청구서 내용 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , b.PAYAMT /* 납부금액 */ , d.LAD_NM /* 토지명 */ , f.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_SE_NM /* 용도구분명 */ , DECODE(c.REAL_BLCK, NULL, a.BLCK || 'B ' || a.LOT || 'L ', c.REAL_BLCK || 'B ' || c.REAL_LOT || 'L ') AS LAD_BLT , c.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || c.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES , c.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || c.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM , e.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , e.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(e.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호_마스크 */ , e.ADRES || ' ' || e.ADRES_DETAIL AS ADRES /* 주소_고객 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , (SELECT x.CNTRCTR_NO , x.PAYAMT FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY x /* 토지계약자 납부 */ WHERE x.PAY_CODE = 'SE' /* 정산금 */ AND x.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# AND ROWNUM = 1 /* 다건일 경우 척행을 기준으로 한다(AS_IS 기준임) */ ) b , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO c /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO d /* 토지정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR e /* 토지고객 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' /* 용도구분 */ ) f WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = b.CNTRCTR_NO AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = c.BLCK AND a.LOT = c.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = c.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CODE = d.LAD_CODE AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = e.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND c.PRPOS_SE = f.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC09Info C09 토지사용승낙서 토지의 표시 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , a.LAD_CODE /* 토지코드 */ , LTRIM(b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES) AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 소재지 */ , LTRIM(b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM) AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 소재지_지번 */ , c.LAD_NM /* 토지명 */ , DECODE(b.REAL_BLCK, NULL, (a.BLCK || '-' || a.LOT || '-' || a.LOT_TY), (b.REAL_BLCK || '-' || b.REAL_LOT || '-' || b.REAL_LOT_TY)) AS LAD_BLT /* 토지 B.L.T */ , DECODE(NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0), 0, b.BGNN_AR, b.DCSN_AR) AS DCSN_AR /* 면적(확정면적) */ , d.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_SE_NM /* 용도구분명 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO c /* 토지정보 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' /* 용도구분 */ ) d WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND b.PRPOS_SE = d.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* C09 토지사용승낙서 토지사용자 목록 조회 */ '토지사용자' AS GUBUN , LTRIM(b.ADRES || ' ' || b.ADRES_DETAIL) AS ADRES , SUBSTR(b.CSTMR_NM, 1, 10) ||' '|| SUBSTR(b.CSTMR_NM, 11, 10) AS CSTMR_NM , b.IHIDNUM , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(b.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호 마스크 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR b /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = b.LAD_CSTMR_NO AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR /* 토지계약자공유자 */ WHERE CNTRCTR_NO = a.CNTRCTR_NO AND LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR = a.LAD_CSTMR_NO) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# UNION ALL SELECT '토지사용자' AS GUBUN , LTRIM(d.ADRES || ' ' || d.ADRES_DETAIL) AS ADRES , SUBSTR(d.CSTMR_NM, 1, 10) ||' '|| SUBSTR(d.CSTMR_NM, 11, 10) AS CSTMR_NM , d.IHIDNUM , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(d.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호 마스크 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR c /* 토지계약자공유자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR d /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND c.LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR = d.LAD_CSTMR_NO AND c.RELIS_DE IS NULL AND c.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* C10 공유자 명부 조회 */ ROWNUM AS NUM /* 순번 */ , a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , b.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , b.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(b.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호 마스크 */ , LTRIM(b.ADRES || ' ' ||b.ADRES_DETAIL) AS ADRES /* 주소_고객 */ , b.TELNO /* 전화번호 */ , b.MBTLNO /* 휴대폰번호 */ , a.QOTA /* 지분 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_COCNR a /* 토지계약자공유자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR b /* 토지고객 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.RELIS_DE IS NULL /* 해제일자 */ AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO_COCNR = b.LAD_CSTMR_NO AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC11Info C11 확인서 내용 조회 */ a.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES AS LOCPLC_ADRES /* 소재지 */ , b.LOCPLC_BASS_ADRES_LNM || ' ' || b.LOCPLC_DETAIL_ADRES_LNM AS LOCPLC_ADRES_LNM /* 소재지_지번 */ , c.LAD_NM /* 토지명 */ , b.BLCK /* 블록 */ , b.LOT /* 롯트 */ , b.LOT_TY /* 롯트타입 */ , b.REAL_BLCK /* 실제블록 */ , b.REAL_LOT /* 실제롯트 */ , b.REAL_LOT_TY /* 실제롯트타입 */ , b.BGNN_AR /* 당초면적 */ , b.DCSN_AR /* 확정면적 */ , d.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_SE_NM /* 용도코드명 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO c /* 토지정보 */ , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' ) d WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND b.PRPOS_SE = d.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO#

WITH V_ACNT_CODE AS ( SELECT /* 계정과목 목록 */ a.YEAR , a.BSNS_SE , a.BALC_SE , d.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE AS LV1_CODE , d.BUDGET_ACNT_NM AS LV1_NM , c.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE AS LV2_CODE , c.BUDGET_ACNT_NM AS LV2_NM , b.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE AS LV3_CODE , b.BUDGET_ACNT_NM AS LV3_NM , a.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE AS LV4_CODE , a.BUDGET_ACNT_NM AS LV4_NM FROM TBBDG_BUDGET_ACNT_CODE a /* 예산계정코드 */ , TBBDG_BUDGET_ACNT_CODE b /* 예산계정코드 */ , TBBDG_BUDGET_ACNT_CODE c /* 예산계정코드 */ , TBBDG_BUDGET_ACNT_CODE d /* 예산계정코드 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.YEAR = b.YEAR(+) AND a.BSNS_SE = b.BSNS_SE(+) AND a.BALC_SE = b.BALC_SE(+) AND a.UPPER_ACNT_CODE = b.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE(+) AND b.YEAR = c.YEAR(+) AND b.BSNS_SE = c.BSNS_SE(+) AND b.BALC_SE = c.BALC_SE(+) AND b.UPPER_ACNT_CODE = c.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE(+) AND c.YEAR = d.YEAR(+) AND c.BSNS_SE = d.BSNS_SE(+) AND c.BALC_SE = d.BALC_SE(+) AND c.UPPER_ACNT_CODE = d.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE(+) ) SELECT /* SLS080500DAO.selectReportC12Info C12 계약체결결의서 내용조회 */ a1.CNTRCTR_NO /* 계약자번호 */ , a1.LAD_CODE /* 토지코드 */ , a1.LAD_NM /* 토지명 */ , a1.BSNS_NM /* 사업명 */ , a1.PRPOS_SE_NM /* 용도구분명 */ , a1.LAD_BLT /* 토지 B.L.T */ , a1.DCSN_AR /* 면적(확정) */ , a1.CNTRCT_DE_YEAR /* 계약년도(수입 년도) */ , c1.LV1_NM /* 관 */ , c1.LV2_NM /* 항 */ , c1.LV3_NM /* 세항 */ , c1.LV4_NM /* 목 */ , a1.CSTMR_NM /* 고객명 */ , a1.IHIDNUM /* 주민등록번호 */ , a1.IHIDNUM_MSK /* 주민등록번호 마스크 */ , a1.ADRES /* 주소_고객 */ , a1.CNTRCT_DE /* 계약일자 */ , a1.PAYAMT /* 납부금액 */ FROM (SELECT a.CNTRCTR_NO , a.LAD_CODE , c.LAD_NM , (SELECT BSNS_NM FROM TBPRJ_BSNS_CODE /* 사업코드 */ WHERE BSNS_CODE = SUBSTR(NVL(c.LTTOT_BSNS_CODE, c.RENT_BSNS_CODE), 1, 3) || '00' ) AS BSNS_NM , f.CODE_NM AS PRPOS_SE_NM , DECODE(b.REAL_BLCK, NULL, (a.BLCK || '블록 ' || a.LOT || '놋트'), (b.REAL_BLCK ||'블록 ' || b.REAL_LOT ||'놋트')) AS LAD_BLT , DECODE(NVL(b.DCSN_AR, 0), 0, b.BGNN_AR, b.DCSN_AR) AS DCSN_AR , DECODE(a.CNTRCTR_MTLTY, NULL, d.CSTMR_NM, (a.CNTRCTR_MTLTY || ' (' || d.CSTMR_NM || ')')) AS CSTMR_NM , d.IHIDNUM , SUBSTR(SFCOM_DEC_ALL(d.IHIDNUM), 0, 7)||'******' AS IHIDNUM_MSK , d.ADRES || ' ' || d.ADRES_DETAIL AS ADRES , a.CNTRCT_DE , b.PRPOS_SE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(a.CNTRCT_DE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY') AS CNTRCT_DE_YEAR , NVL(PAYAMT, 0) AS PAYAMT FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR a /* 토지계약자 */ , TBSLS_LAD_DETAIL_INFO b /* 토지상세정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_INFO c /* 토지정보 */ , TBSLS_LAD_CSTMR d /* 토지고객 */ , (SELECT CNTRCTR_NO , SUM(NVL(PAYAMT, 0)) AS PAYAMT /* 납부금액 */ FROM TBSLS_LCNTRCTR_PAY /* 토지계약자납부 */ WHERE PAY_CODE LIKE 'S%' GROUP BY CNTRCTR_NO ) e , (SELECT CODE , CODE_NM FROM TBCOM_CMMN_CODE /* 공통코드 */ WHERE GRP_CODE = 'LAD003' /* 용도구분 */ ) f WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.LAD_CODE = b.LAD_CODE AND a.BLCK = b.BLCK AND a.LOT = b.LOT AND a.LOT_TY = b.LOT_TY AND a.LAD_CODE = c.LAD_CODE AND a.LAD_CSTMR_NO = d.LAD_CSTMR_NO(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = e.CNTRCTR_NO(+) AND b.PRPOS_SE = f.CODE(+) AND a.CNTRCTR_NO = #CNTRCTR_NO# ) a1 , TBACC_BUDGET_ACNT_LAD_MAPNG b1 /* 예산계정토지매핑 */ , V_ACNT_CODE c1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND a1.CNTRCT_DE_YEAR = b1.BUDGET_YEAR(+) AND a1.LAD_CODE = b1.LAD_CODE(+) AND a1.PRPOS_SE = b1.PRPOS_CODE(+) AND b1.INCME_SE(+) = '01' /* 수입구분 : 01(분양금) */ AND b1.BUDGET_YEAR = c1.YEAR AND b1.BSNS_SE = c1.BSNS_SE AND b1.BALC_SE = c1.BALC_SE AND b1.BUDGET_ACNT_CODE = c1.LV4_CODE
